CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Four model compounds , ( BDTT - DPP ) 3 , (BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP) , (BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD) , and ( BDTT - TPD ) 3 were used and calculated for comparison.

Let's think step by step.

1. BDTT-DPP
2. (BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP)
3. (BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD)
4. BDTT-TPD
5. (BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP)
6. (BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD)
7. BDTT-TPD
8. (BDTT-TPD)3
9. BDTT-DPP
10. (BDTT-DPP)3

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are: BDTT-DPP, BDTT-TPD. The parentheses indicate that these entities are part of a larger compound, so the full compound should be considered as a single Material Name entity. Therefore, the paragraph contains 10 unique Material Name entities.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. BDTT-DPP
2. (BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP)
3. (BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD)
4. BDTT-TPD
5. (BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP)
6. (BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD)

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to materials are: BDTT-DPP and BDTT-TPD. The parentheses indicate that these entities are part of a larger compound, so the full compound should be considered as a single Material Name entity. Therefore, the paragraph contains 3 unique Material Name entities.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |
| BDTT-DPP |
| (BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP) |
| (BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD) |
| BDTT-TPD |
| (BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP) |
| (BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD) |

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph presented as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name" are:

| --- |
